# Credits
## vala logo
Using a modified version of the [Unofficial vala logo](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Vala_Logo.svg) (with its backgound removed and converted to base64) in the vala language badge.

![Vala](https://img.shields.io/badge/VALA-75507b?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
